think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'effective_io_concurrency' is a numerical knob with a range from 1 to 1000. However, it also has a special value of zero which disables the issuance of asynchronous I/O requests. This special value changes the function of the knob, making it a 'special' numerical knob. Therefore, the knob 'effective_io_concurrency' is a special knob with a special value of 0.
